item.title: A Video Introduction to Web3.0 (The Semantic Web?)
item.description: Today I found a very interesting video discussing the term of the Semantic Web, not only in a technical way. Have a look at the following video: [vimeo 11529540] What do you think? Do you think the Semantic Web is going to happen as many people think? Related articles by Zemanta Web 3.0, The Movie [Video] (techcrunch.com) Semantics, tagging and Twitter: Web 2.0 Eureka or not? (ml.sun.ac.za) Semantium.
